The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in West Sussex so far as at 13 June is 42,705 (4,942.8 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 08 June, there were 258 new confirmed cases (29.9 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 01 June, there were 152 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 70% (106 extra cases).
